conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>Oh. You're not a worker, are you?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, look away. We've got a production line here. Creating proto bricks.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>These brutes keep it running all the time.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>And I have to make sure they do it.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
